rev.comment: /* External links */ Link to Seagal in Buddhist context.
/* Seagal's other identities */ OK Going for a mellowed version of the text.You take a step too; keep off Uma.You're not a Muslim ?Cover up women from head to heel ? Wrong for Tantra.Grow up !
This page was most recently edited by someone who is fluent in the English language!
Reverting vandalism from Halloween Jack.He's also vandalising the site linked to this. Saying sexual content invalid on a Tantric Buddhist site : he's absurd. It's the basis of it !
Rm "Distancing from Buddhism" section. See talk page.
BOT - Reverted edit by [[User talk:130.159.248.1]] (46921983) - reverted to [[User talk:Geir Smith]] (46903635)
/* Distancing from Buddhism */ Highlighting obsure parts of the sentence.
/* Distancing from Buddhism */ Website overview for Seagal-page.
/* Seagal's other identities */ Glimmerings of dissent.
/* Stuntman abuse controversy */ Removing the entry about ABOL rather put it elsewhere than with stuntman controversy on page.
Revert changes by Nat Krause repeatedly deleting without talking about it. Not Wikipedia policy. Three reverts closely following, by Krause, qualifies for losing editing rights. See talk.
revert. Removing some material from "stuntman abuse", per talk
rv to last version by Hooperbloob; restored deleted sections
removing some text. See talk. /* Stuntman abuse controversy */
removing this section -- you absolutely can't cite Wikipedia user pages here. /* Seagalogy */
/* Stuntman abuse controversy */ links to three sites.
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/65.189.217.157|65.189.217.157]] ([[User talk:65.189.217.157|talk]]) to last version by Ghetteaux
according to IMDB, he is 6'4'', and he was born in 1951
Please check this article, there is something strange
If you're going to add something like that to the article, A) provide a source and B) spell it correctly!
I'm sorry, but I don't see any evidence to suggest that Seagal is a "master swordsman." Can you provide a reference? Also, rm trivia items that are already detailed in other parts of the article.
"master" and "swordsman" are not only japanese concepts. check out [[japanophile]] and pay attention to your adopted cultural filter.
/* Trivia */ sorry no way - he does not have the background to claim swordmaster. As far as I know he has Shodan (beginning level) in Kendo. I suggest you look for the Draeger story.
/* Trivia */ Blackbelt does not equal master status.

Seagall has appeared numerous times on Asahi TV, and according to the Aikido Open Encyclopedia (www.aikiwiki.org/StevenSeagal), he is fluent in Japanese. His native language is English.
